I am installing Monkey-spider... during the process of which I need to inst=
all and run heritrix...

I've downloaded heritrix-1.14.4 and followed the s=
teps for installation as described in http://crawler.archive.org/articles/u=
ser_manual/install.html

I did as described in section "Running Heritrix" i=
n the above link.

Now when I type :   % $HERITRIX_HOME/bin/heritrix --help=


I get 
 
>Mon Apr  4 12:59:54 IST 2011 Starting heritrix ................=
.... ......................................................................=
...........................................................................=
........................................

just the dots are appearing conti=
nuously but heritrix isn't starting even after 30-40min.

I am working from=
 University Campus: The campus has a Proxy server. Will that create any pro=
blem? Should I need to do any config settings/proxy settings in heritrix ? =


PS: I even tried installing it at home (with no proxy). But still the res=
ult is the same.  

As I tried installing with proxy and without proxy,I do=
n't understand what actually is the problem.

Kindly let me know what's the=
 problem and how to deal with it. I am using Ubuntu 9.04. If you need any o=
ther details i'll let u know.

Thanks in Advance.

-Sashidhar
